39  class _OgrePCZPluginExport AntiPortal : public PortalBase
40  {
41  public:
42  AntiPortal(const String &name, const PORTAL_TYPE type = PORTAL_TYPE_QUAD);
43  virtual ~AntiPortal();
44 
46  const String& getMovableType() const;
47 
48  };
49 
51  class _OgrePCZPluginExport AntiPortalFactory : public PortalBaseFactory
52  {
53  protected:
54  MovableObject* createInstanceImpl(const String& name, const NameValuePairList* params);
55  public:
56  AntiPortalFactory() {}
57  ~AntiPortalFactory() {}
58 
59  static String FACTORY_TYPE_NAME;
60  static unsigned long FACTORY_TYPE_FLAG;
61 
62  const String& getType() const
63  { return FACTORY_TYPE_NAME; }
64 
65  void destroyInstance(MovableObject* obj);
66 
68  bool requestTypeFlags() const
69  { return true; }
70 
71  };
